alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 11 at 2:28AM PST until December 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon. In Washington, Kittitas Valley. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In areas with below freezing temperatures, fog droplets will freeze on surfaces, creating slick roadways and other surfaces such as sidewalks and decks..
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
